full_summary:
# Tender Announcement for High Current Potentiostat/Galvanostat
==============================================

## Tender Details

* Tender ID: WS3712595973
* Date of Publication: October 28, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: November 14, 2022, 02:00:00 PM EST
* Contract Start Date: November 7, 2022
* Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

## Procurement Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the National Research Council of Canada (NRC), is seeking proposals for the supply, delivery, installation, and training on a high current potentiostat/galvanostat system. The equipment is required for single-cell electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.

## Tender Requirements

* Supply one high current potentiostat/galvanostat system
* Deliver and install the system at the NRC Vancouver branch
* Provide training on the equipment use
* Ensure all work is completed by March 15, 2023

## Tender Evaluation Criteria

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements

This tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Contact Information

For further information, please contact:
Daphne Yu
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
Phone: Not available
Email: [daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:daphne.yu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
